clear_brief: Clear the last messages, admins only
clear_description: Admins can use this command to clear the most recent messages inside a text channel (excluding the clear command).
ping_description: Used to get an average of the response time from the bot.
info_message:
>>> *"Odoaldo, un personaggio particolarmente benvoluto, va in refettorio a mangiare un panino con la mortadella."*

**21 Aprile 2018**
info_description: Show some more detailed info on the bot, its version, author, repository url, license.
whoami_description: Very simple command replying with a mention for the author of the command.
reset_database_message:
Oh no! Mi hanno cancellato la memoria! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhh! :dizzy_face:

`Odoaldo database was reset to init data`
reset_database_brief: Reset Odoaldo database to init data, admins only
reset_database_description:
Admins can use this command to force a "factory reset" of the database documents.
Warning: use with caution and make sure that the owner of the bot can fix eventual problems.
